properties.entry: SELECT CP_NAME , DISCOUNT , CP_ENDDATE FROM ISSUANCECOUPON I JOIN COUPON C ON I.CP_NO = C.CP_NO WHERE I.CP_STATUS = 'N' AND CP_ENDDATE >= SYSDATE AND USER_NO =?
SELECT COUNT(*)AS COUNT FROM(SELECT CP_NAME, DISCOUNT, CP_ENDDATE FROM ISSUANCECOUPON I JOIN COUPON C ON I.CP_NO = C.CP_NO WHERE I.CP_STATUS = 'N' AND CP_ENDDATE >= SYSDATE AND USER_NO =?)
SELECT REPLY_NO , CM_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , REPLY_ENROLLDATE FROM REPLY JOIN USERINFO USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT CM_NO , CMCG_NO , CM_TITLE , CM_CONTENT , CM_ENROLLDATE , CM_COUNT , USER_NAME FROM COMMUNITY JOIN USERINFO USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT PAY_NO , CL_NO , ISUCP_NO , PAYMENT , FINAL_PAYMENT , ORDER_NAME , ORDER_PHONE , ORDER_EMAIL , PAY_DATE FROM PAY WHERE REFUND != 'Y'
